title: President Donald J. Trump is Dedicated to Combating MS-13 – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Immigration	

Issued on:
May 23, 2018
I am calling on the Congress to finally close the deadly loopholes that have allowed MS-13, and other criminals, to break into our country.
						President Donald J. Trump					MS-13 IS A THREAT TO AMERICAN COMMUNITIES: President Donald J. Trump is committed to protecting communities from the violent animals of MS-13.  STRONG ACTION AGAINST MS-13:  President Trump’s Administration is committed to combating MS-13 on all possible fronts. ELIMINATE LOOPHOLES HINDERING EFFORTS TO COMBAT MS-13: The current immigration system contains loopholes and barriers that hinder efforts to fully confront MS-13.
